return.title: Return Policy
return.content: We offer a 30-day return policy on most items. Products must be in original condition with all packaging and accessories included.

conditions: Item must be in original condition
All original packaging and accessories must be included
Receipt or proof of purchase required
Item must not show signs of wear or damage

warranty.title: Warranty Information
warranty.content: Most products come with manufacturer warranties. Extended warranty options are available for electronics and appliances.

conditions: Warranty covers manufacturing defects
Does not cover damage from misuse or accidents
Original receipt required for warranty claims
Warranty service handled by manufacturer
exceptions: Physical damage from drops or spills
Software issues not related to hardware
details.contact_info: Warranty claims: warranty@claudecart.com or manufacturer directly

shipping.title: Shipping Policy
shipping.content: We offer free standard shipping on orders over $50. Express shipping available for faster delivery.

details.time_limit: Standard: 5-7 business days, Express: 2-3 business days
conditions: Free standard shipping on orders $50+
Express shipping available for additional fee
Orders ship within 1-2 business days
Tracking information provided via email
exceptions: Remote locations may require additional time

price_match.title: Price Match Guarantee
price_match.content: We'll match the price of identical items found at major competitors. Price match must be requested before purchase.

details.time_limit: Must be requested at time of purchase
conditions: Item must be identical (same model, brand, specifications)
Competitor must be authorized retailer
Competitor's price must be currently available
Proof of competitor's price required

general.title: General Store Policies
general.content: Our commitment to excellent customer service includes fair policies, quality products, and responsive support.

details.time_limit: Policies updated periodically - check website for current terms
conditions: All sales subject to availability
Prices subject to change without notice
Age restrictions apply to certain products
Valid ID required for some purchases
exceptions: Special orders may have different terms
Bulk orders may require additional processing time
Some items restricted by state or local laws
details.contact_info: General inquiries: info@claudecart.com or visit our FAQ page
